title: Mountain Medical Physician Specialists selects MBX - Medical Billing Experts LLC as its medical billing provider
text:
MBX - Medical Billing Experts 
SALT LAKE CITY, Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Mountain Medical Physician Specialists (MMPS), one of the largest radiology practices in the U.S., with over 70 full-time physicians providing services in Utah and Idaho, has awarded MBX - Medical Billing Experts (MBX) an exclusive outsourced medical billing contract. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150923/270106LOGO 
Historically, Mountain Medical has performed their billing in-house but the system was approaching end of life. "This caused us to review our billing operations and we ultimately concluded that outsourcing was the way to maximize operational efficiency and revenue," said Julie Penrod, CEO of Mountain Medical. 
Mountain Medical reviewed the market and shortlisted two outsource billing companies, eventually selecting MBX. Julie concludes, "We are confident that MBX will be a true partner, not simply a vendor. They know the market, they can handle a practice of our size and they are innovative. Overall, they provide an excellent value for our needs." 
MBX will be providing Revenue Cycle Management services to Mountain Medical, managing their billing from coding the physician's report to collecting payment and all the steps in between. MBX will also be supporting Mountain Medical with a comprehensive set of reporting information and data analytics via their APEx Business Intelligence tool. 
David Monaghan, CEO of MBX, commented, "We are very proud to have been awarded the contract to provide outsource billing services to Mountain Medical. We have implemented a number of new clients this year and have done so without any gaps in revenue when our new clients switched from their old services or system to us. We look forward to delivering exactly the same for Mountain Medical." 
About MBX Headquartered in Salt Lake City, UT with operation centers throughout the U.S., MBX - Medical Billing Experts provide medical billing services to the radiology, anesthesiology, emergency and pathology specialties. With over seven decades of combined experience and 300 outsource system implementations, the MBX leadership team approaches each client as a revenue cycle management strategic partner, delivering excellent patient and physician relationship management. MBX's market-leading clean claims rate and exemplary collection rates lower practices' operational overhead and increase cash flow.
